title: Five-Star Swiss Alps Luxury with Michelin-Starred Restaurant & Mountain Views
description: Escape to The Chedi Andermatt, a spectacular five-star hotel in a secluded Swiss Alps village, to discover year-round alpine luxury. Explore the mountain ranges on foot, play a round at the nearby golf course or explore the local bakeries, restaurants and shops of the village of Andermatt. Savour a 10-course kaiseki menu at the Michelin-starred Japanese Restaurant, allow sore muscles to recover at The Spa & Health Club or lounge by roaring fires in The Bar and Living Room.
